    public static class GuiConfigEntries.BooleanEntry
extends GuiConfigEntries.ButtonEntry
    BooleanPropEntry Provides a GuiButton that toggles between true and false.

      • isDefault

        public boolean isDefault()
        从接口复制的说明: GuiConfigEntries.IConfigEntry
        Is this entry's value equal to the default value? Generally true should be returned if this entry is not a property or category entry.
        指定者:
        isDefault 在接口中 GuiConfigEntries.IConfigEntry
        指定者:

      • saveConfigElement

        public boolean saveConfigElement()
        从接口复制的说明: GuiConfigEntries.IConfigEntry
        Handles saving any changes that have been made to this entry back to the underlying object. It is a good practice to check isChanged() before performing the save action. This method should return true if the element has changed AND REQUIRES A RESTART.
        指定者:
        saveConfigElement 在接口中 GuiConfigEntries.IConfigEntry
        指定者:
        saveConfigElement 在类中 GuiConfigEntries.ListEntryBase
